targets.expr: count ( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 活动

panels.description: Number of assigned GPUs having utilization 0% in the VC.

targets.expr: (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.description: Average GPU memory utilization across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: GPU内存

panels.description: Average GPU memory utilization across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: NPU内存

panels.description:
Average CPU usage per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

TODO: Distinguish 0 GPU task_cpu_percent.

targets.expr: (sum (avg by (instance)(task_cpu_percent{vc_name="$vc_name"})) / count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) / 100) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: CPU

panels.description:
Average memory usage per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

TODO: Distinguish 0 GPU task_mem_usage_byte.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance)(task_mem_usage_byte{vc_name="$vc_name"})) / count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 内存

panels.description:
Average disk read rate per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

TODO: Distinguish 0 GPU task_block_in_byte.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance)(rate(task_block_in_byte{vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 磁盘读取

panels.description:
Average disk write rate per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

TODO: Distinguish 0 GPU task_block_out_byte.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance)(rate(task_block_out_byte{vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 磁盘写入

panels.description:
Average network inbound rate per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance)(rate(task_net_in_byte{vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 网络输入

panels.description:
Average network outbound rate per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the VC.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance)(rate(task_net_out_byte{vc_name="$vc_name"}[5m]))) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 网络输出
随时间推移每个活动设备的资源

panels.description: Average GPU memory utilization per active GPU.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance,uuid)((task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

(sum(avg by (instance,uuid)((task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

(sum(avg by (instance,uuid)((task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

(sum(avg by (instance,uuid)((task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (instance)(task_cpu_percent{vc_name="$vc_name"})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) / 100) OR on() vector(0)
(sum(avg by (instance)(task_cpu_percent)) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) / 100) OR on() vector(0)
(sum(avg by (instance)(task_cpu_percent{vc_name="$vc_name"})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) / 100) OR on() vector(0)
(sum(avg by (instance)(task_cpu_percent)) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) / 100) OR on() vector(0)

(sum(avg by (instance)(task_mem_usage_byte{vc_name="$vc_name"})) / count(avg by (instance,uuid)(task_device_percent{vc_name="$vc_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)
